Table of Contents for current page

BaseButton 按钮 #

常用的操作按钮

基础用法 #

使用 primary success warining danger plain、round 等字段来定义按钮的样式。

<template>
  <Form>
    <FormItem>
      <BaseButton>default</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton primary>primary</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton secondary>secondary</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton success>success</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton danger>danger</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton info>info</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton warning>warning</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton>中文</BaseButton>
    </FormItem>
    <FormItem>
      <BaseButton plain>plain</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton primary plain>primary</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton secondary plain>secondary</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton success plain>success</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton danger plain>danger</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton info plain>info</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton warning plain>warning</BaseButton>
    </FormItem>
    <FormItem>
      <BaseButton round>default</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton primary round>primary</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton secondary round>secondary</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton success round>success</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton danger round>danger</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton info round>info</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton warning round>warning</BaseButton>
    </FormItem>
  </Form>
</template>
显示代码
复制代码片段

文字按钮 #

没有边框和背景色的按钮

<template>
  <FormItem>
    <BaseButton round>default</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton primary round>primary</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton secondary round>secondary</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton success round>success</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton danger round>danger</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton info round>info</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton warning round>warning</BaseButton>
  </FormItem>
</template>
显示代码
复制代码片段

禁用状态 #

你可以使用disabled属性来定义按钮是否被禁用。

使用disabled属性来控制按钮是否为禁用状态。 该属性接受一个Boolean类型的值。

<template>
  <FormItem>
    <BaseButton disabled>default</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton primary disabled>primary</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton secondary disabled>secondary</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton success disabled>success</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton danger disabled>danger</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton info disabled>info</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton warning disabled>warning</BaseButton>
  </FormItem>
  <FormItem>
    <BaseButton plain disabled>plain</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton primary plain disabled>primary</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton secondary plain disabled>secondary</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton success plain disabled>success</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton danger plain disabled>danger</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton info plain disabled>info</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton warning plain disabled>warning</BaseButton>
  </FormItem>
</template>
显示代码
复制代码片段

按钮大小 #

除了默认的大小，按钮组件还提供了几种额外的尺寸可供选择，以便适配不同的场景。

可使用large和small来设置按钮大小。

<template>
  <Form>
    <FormItem>
      <BaseButton primary small>small</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton primary>default</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton primary large>large</BaseButton>
    </FormItem>
    <FormItem>
      <BaseButton primary plain small>small</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton primary plain>default</BaseButton>
      <BaseButton primary plain large>large</BaseButton>
    </FormItem>
  </Form>
</template>
显示代码
复制代码片段

链接按钮 #

可以通过制定 href 属性，将按钮设置为链接按钮，并跳转至指定链接

<template>
  <FormItem>
    <BaseButton :href="link">default</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton primary :href="link">primary</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton secondary :href="link">secondary</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton success :href="link">success</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton danger :href="link">danger</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton info :href="link">info</BaseButton>
    <BaseButton warning :href="link">warning</BaseButton>
  </FormItem>
</template>

<script setup>
const link = 'http://www.baidu.com'
</script>
显示代码
复制代码片段

自定义按钮 #

可以通过默认插槽的方式自定义按钮

<template>
  <BaseButton>
    <Icon :name="['fa', 'user-secret']" />
  </BaseButton>
  <BaseButton primary> <Icon :name="['fa', 'copy']" /> Copy </BaseButton>
</template>
显示代码
复制代码片段

Button Props #

prop说明类型默认值
tagcomponent tagstring,objectbutton
href链接string''
primary基础booleanfalse
secondary次要booleanfalse
success成功booleanfalse
danger危险booleanfalse
info信息booleanfalse
warning警告booleanfalse
plain文字模式booleanfalse
active激活的booleanfalse
small小尺寸booleanfalse
large大尺寸booleanfalse
disabled禁用booleanfalse
